Module cz.vutbr.fit.layout.core
Package cz.vutbr.fit.layout.api

Interface PageSetStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    public interface PageSetStorage
extends Service
    A service that is able to manage a list of pages that are being processed. It may load the next/previous page when available.
    Author:
    burgetr

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getCurrentIndex()
      Obtains the index of the currently loaded page.
      PageSet getCurrentPageSet()
      Obtains the currently active page set that is used for storing the new pages and obtaining the previous/next page.
      int getTotalCount()
      Obtains the total number of pages available in the current page set.
      void loadNext()
      Loads the next page from the current page set.
      void loadPageAt​(int index)
      Loads the page from the storage based in its index.
      void loadPrevious()
      Loads the previous page from the current page set.
      boolean nextPageAvailable()
      Check whether a next page is available in the currently processed page set.
      boolean previousPageAvailable()
      Checks whether a previous page is available in the currently processed page set.

      • Methods inherited from interface cz.vutbr.fit.layout.api.Service

        getDescription, getId, getName, setServiceManager

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPageSet

        PageSet getCurrentPageSet()
        Obtains the currently active page set that is used for storing the new pages and obtaining the previous/next page.
        Returns:
        the page set or null when no page set is active

      • nextPageAvailable

        boolean nextPageAvailable()
        Check whether a next page is available in the currently processed page set.
        Returns:

      • loadNext

        void loadNext()
        Loads the next page from the current page set.

      • previousPageAvailable

        boolean previousPageAvailable()
        Checks whether a previous page is available in the currently processed page set.
        Returns:

      • loadPrevious

        void loadPrevious()
        Loads the previous page from the current page set.

      • getTotalCount

        int getTotalCount()
        Obtains the total number of pages available in the current page set.
        Returns:
        the page count or 0 when the page set is empty or no page set is selected.

      • getCurrentIndex

        int getCurrentIndex()
        Obtains the index of the currently loaded page.
        Returns:
        The page index or -1 when no page is loaded.

      • loadPageAt

        void loadPageAt​(int index)
        Loads the page from the storage based in its index.
        Parameters:
        index - The page index.
